nodes.title:
Good one from @verdadcap today on bubbles

Ray Dalio & Peter Lynch began warning investors about a bubble in 1995

Then this happened in the S&P 500:

1996 +23%
1997 +33%
1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k https://t.co/J9gUQ0nc1g
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
今天，@verdadcap的一篇关于泡泡的文章写得不错。

雷-达利欧&彼得-林奇在1995年开始警告投资者有泡沫。

然后这种情况发生在S&P 500中。

1996 +23%
1997 +33%
1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k

1996 +23%

1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k

nodes.title:
From its peak in January 2018, Ethereum fell over 94% to its low in December 2018. 

It has since rallied 1,620% to hit a new high today. 

$ETH https://t.co/DiQlAyWwPG
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
从2018年1月的峰值，Ethereum下跌超过94%，至2018年12月的低点。

此后，它已经反弹了1620%，今天创下新高。

$ETH https://t.co/DiQlAyWwPG

從2018年1月的峯值，Ethereum下跌超過94%，至2018年12月的低點。

此後，它已經反彈了1620%，今天創下新高。

nodes.title:
Traded emails w/someone this week who claimed an 8% annual return was far too low

They wanted way much higher

This is how bubbles form

Ppl see others getting rich and go further & further out on the risk curve

(doesn't mean it's not fun while it lasts)
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
本周与某人交换了电子邮件，他声称8%的年回报率太低了。

他们想要更高的价格

这就是气泡的形成过程

人们看到别人发财，就会在风险曲线上越走越远&。

趁热打铁

本週與某人交換了電子郵件，他聲稱8%的年回報率太低了。

他們想要更高的價格

這就是氣泡的形成過程

人們看到別人發財，就會在風險曲線上越走越遠&。

趁熱打鐵
